meanings.definition: A person who advocates for self-sufficiency and independence.
meanings.sent1: The autarkists in our community grow their own food and generate their own electricity.
meanings.sent2: Many autarkists believe in living off the grid and being self-reliant.
meanings.sent3: The autarkists at the meeting joked about starting their own self-sufficient island nation.
meanings.sent4: In a world of interdependence, the autarkists stand out like lone wolves.
meanings.sent5: The image of the autarkists tending to their self-sustaining farm was inspiring.

meanings.definition: The belief in economic self-sufficiency and independence.
meanings.sent1: Autarkists promote the idea of countries producing all they need internally.
meanings.sent2: The autarkists' philosophy focuses on reducing reliance on imports.
meanings.sent3: Some people find the autarkists' views on economic independence intriguing.
meanings.sent4: In a globalized world, the autarkists' ideals may seem challenging to achieve.
meanings.sent5: The concept of autarkists striving for economic autonomy is thought-provoking.
